---
title: "RMarkdown example used in NHS-R Community Intro to R and R Studio"
author: "Simon Wellesley-Miller"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(magrittr)
```

## View slides

```{r echo=FALSE, results="asis"}
dir(pattern = "\\R.*\\.Rmd") %>%
  stringr::str_replace(".Rmd", ".html") %>%
  paste(" * [", ., "](", ., ")", sep = "", collapse = "\n") %>%
  cat("\n")
```
